attributionInfo.brokerName: Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Kee Realty NB
Berkshire Hathaway HomeServices Kee Realty Birm

data.description: *** MULTIPLE OFFERS RECEIVED. HIGHEST AND BEST BY 7PM 04/08***BEAUTIFUL BRICK RANCH WITH 3 BEDROOMS, REMODELED BATH, KITCHEN IS COMPLETELY REMODELED, SOFT CLOSE DRAWERS,CUSTOM CABINETS, GRANITE COUNTER TOPS, NICE OVERHANG TO ADD COUNTER STOOLS, ALL NEWER STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES AND FLOORING. BEAUTIFUL HARDWOOD FLOORS IN BEDROOMS AND LIVING ROOM. NEW VINYL WOOD FLOORING IN FAMILY ROOM WITH NATURAL FIREPLACE WITH INDOOR BBQ. NEW CEILING FANS, MANY NEW DOORS, ATTACHED 2 CAR GARAGE. UNFINISHED BASEMENT WITH SEPERATE  LAUNDRY AREA, WASHER AND DRYER ARE INCLUDED. BRAND NEW ROOF & NEW FURNACE AND A/C. ALL THIS AND YOU GET ACCESS TO ALL THE LAKEFRONT PARKS FOR ST CLAIR SHORES RESIDENCE ONLY. YOU CAN ENJOY THE RESTAURANTS AND PUBS WITH A SHORT 10 MIN WALK. THIS IS A HIGHLY SOUGHT AFTER AREA . THIS HOME WILL NOT LAST.
